summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: La Deessa Powerful 20% Vitamin C Serum For Face +11% Hyaluronic, Organic Anti Aging Skin Care. Hydrate, Moisturize, Increase Collagen, Reduce Fine Lines, Hyper pigmentation & Acne. Review Date: 2014/07/29 Store: La Deessa Product Description: ['La Deessa products are the answer to compromised skin structure & integrity. With the utmost respect for our eco system, La Deessa sustainably combines Natural, Organic, Plant Based and Wild Crafted Botanicals with clinically proven & independently peer reviewed superstar natural and organic age-defying ingredients with highly effective delivery systems to create results-driven anti aging skin care products. KEY INGREDIENT HIGHLIGHTS: ALOE VERA increases your body’s production of collagen and is packed with essential vitamins including A, B1, B2, B6, B12, C & E. Aloe penetrates skin four-times (4x) more rapidly than water and accelerates skin cell reproduction by as much as eight-times (8x)! VITAMIN C supports every aspect of collagen production from stem cell activity to improving the structural integrity, resilience and stability of the skin. Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate is an extremely stable and gentle Vitamin C derivative and a precursor to Vitamin C; it waits to convert into Ascorbic Acid until it is fully absorbed, at which time the sodium molecules separate, converting it into pure Vitamin C deep within your skin...this prevents irritation and amplifies antioxidant benefits, making Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate a superior form of Vitamin C in cosmetic formulations. HYALURONIC ACID has the unique ability to hold more than 1000 times its weight in water, allowing the skin to retain more water. Amazingly, hyaluronic acid adjusts its moisture absorption to your skin’s need for moisture making it ideal for all skin types. Hyaluronic acid also protects the epidermis by scavenging reactive oxygen species generated by ultra violet light. Our formulations contain high percentages of Hyaluronic Acid. MSM- METHYL SULPHONYL MTHANE (ORGANIC SULFUR) Dubbed the “Beauty Mineral” Organic sulfur is referred to as the “Beauty Mineral” because it promotes oxygen transport across cell membranes (intracellular) facilitating cellular regeneration…resulting in skin that is more beautiful.'] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Fragrance Free', 'Brand': 'La Deessa', 'Item Form': 'liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Gluten Free, Natural, Vegan', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 2 x 2 inches; 3 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LD-VITAC20', 'UPC': '040232150944', 'Manufacturer': 'La Deessa'} Review Text: Thank you La Deessa for sending me this great product to try out! I am now one your dedicated Vitamin C Serum fans! This formula hydrates my skin perfectly and leaves it feeling smooth. After using for a few weeks now I have noticed that some spots on my face are lighter and in some cases gone entirely! It has even helped with my fine lines! Love this stuff and I would highly recommend it!! I am not sure how I have lived without it all these years?? Review Title: Great Stuff! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Yalmeh Naturals Eye Bright Gel Review Date: 2014/11/03 Store: Yalmeh Peerless Beauty Product Description: ["Yalmeh Glory Eye Bright Gel ranks as a superior Anti Aging product for all your skin. It is extremely effective at eliminating dark circles and wrinkles. It is also efficient for puffiness and loss of tone. SAFE, ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS- Yalmeh Glory Eye Bright Gel contains all natural ingredients, no toxic chemicals or cancer causing additives - no mineral oil, sulfates or alcohol ,propylene glycol or paraben. We do not test our products on animals NEVER-EVER. This is the BEST EYE GEL and is an effective natural solution for all types of skin. And, it lasts forever - a little goes a long way. And what matters most, however, is that the Yalmeh Glory Eye Gel works incredibly well. You will feel better both inside and out. THIS EYE GEL is 100% natural & 75% organic Click the 'Add to Cart' button at the top of this page NOW - Your Eyes Will Thank You."] Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.4 x 0.4 x 0.4 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GEBG-Y005', 'UPC': '640671981439 885612923240', 'Manufacturer': 'SETAF'} Review Text: I have to give a big shout out to Yalmeh for sending me this Glory Eye Bright Gel to review. It has become my favorite day time eye cream of the moment. It just feels so refreshing when you put it on, especially early in the morning when your still feeling tired and your eyes are still in the process of waking up. The Glory Eye Bright Gel is really hydrating and really light weight so it just melts into the skin around your eyes. It also really helps with all that puffiness that I always have under my eyes in the morning. I naturally have dark circles around my eyes so I don't really benefit from the eye brightening capabilities of this eye cream but I can see how it would work great for those people that have dark circles from things like not getting enough sleep. All that and it has also made the fine lines around my eyes less noticeable!! Review Title: It has become my favorite day time eye cream of the moment Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Dr Song 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Acne Treatment (6oz) Review Date: 2014/12/12 Store: Dr Song Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.4 x 5.3 x 2.3 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '850603005410'} Review Text: Dr Song sent me the Remineralization Gel along with the Teeth Whitening system to review for my GlamRiver blog. The Remineralization was really beneficial and helped with my teeth sensitivity and prepared them for the whitening. The Remineralization also helps strengthen enamel which is also something I need as well. I think this product is great if you are thinking about doing any teeth whitening OR even if you just need to reduce teeth sensitivity. Review Title: I think this product is great if you are thinking about doing any teeth whitening ... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Brilladerm Skincare Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum Anti Aging and Wrinkle Formula - Plump, Hydrate and Moisturize, 2 oz Review Date: 2015/08/14 Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Item Weight': '0.31 Pounds', 'Item Volume': '60 Milliliters', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Ounce', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 1.7 x 1.7 inches; 4.96 Ounces', 'UPC': '881314946570'} Review Text: I am a die hard fan of Hyaluronic Acid and it's part of my everyday skincare routines! Hyaluronic Acid does amazing things for the skin it's a brilliant moisturizer but it also helps improve the tone & texture of your skin and helps diminish the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
I apply this Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum on my entire face, neck and decollete to help keep my skin young and wrinkle free! I also started having my husband use this Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum by Brilladerm Skincare on his hands as well. He works in construction but he primarily lays tile so his hand and fingers get really dried out and they crack and bleed. This serum has really helped heal his hands and helped keep them moisturized so they don't crack like they used to! This is seriously great stuff!
I love that it's super lightweight so it absorbs instantly, it's non-greasy so it works well for all skin types AND it's also Vegan, Paraben Free, Cruelty Free, Oil-free and contains no dyes, fragrances or fillers!

***I did receive this product at a discount or complimentary in exchange for my honest, unbiased review. However, I was not paid in anyway and my thoughts and opinions are my own.*** Review Title: I love that it's super lightweight so it absorbs instantly!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Natural Being Anti-Aging Oily Skin Night Cream Review Date: 2016/03/02 Store: ATOPAL Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.5 x 1.7 x 1.7 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'ATOPAL'} Review Text: If you've been reading my blog, GlamRiver over the last few weeks then you already know that I've been testing out a skincare line by Natural Beauty Limited and it's no secret that I've been loving all the products. The latest one and sadly my last....for now....is this Manuka Honey & Manuka Oil Night Cream.
I've been testing out a few heavy night oils over the last couple weeks so I decided to just use this Night Cream on my decollete so I could get a good feel for what I liked about it without it being overrun by other products.
As I expected this is another gem of a product! While the consistency is a bit thicker than the Day Cream, as it should be, it still absorbs nicely and leaves skin feeling really well hydrated and nourished. I've been applying this at night right before bed and in the mornings I notice how soft, smooth and maybe even a little more plump my skin looks and feels.
This product contains the Manuka Honey & Manuka Oil which help fight the micro-organisms that cause irritation, help stimulate cell renewal while hydrating and leave skin looking and feeling revitalized.
So, once again, I am a big fan of all things Natural Beauty Limited. They have some truly exceptional products that are definitely worth checking out! Review Title: Another great product! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: La Deessa Powerful 20% Vitamin C Serum For Face +11% Hyaluronic, Organic Anti Aging Skin Care. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for organic, natural, and eco-friendly skincare products, particularly those that highlight effective anti-aging properties. Consistent high ratings (notably 5.0) suggest a positive sentiment towards products that emphasize hydration and skin rejuvenation, such as serums and creams featuring Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and natural botanicals. 

Common themes in their purchases indicate a focus on addressing specific skin concerns such as fine lines, wrinkles, dark circles, and acne, favoring lightweight, non-greasy formulations that absorb quickly. Their reviews reflect satisfaction with products that provide visible results, particularly in improving skin tone, texture, and moisture retention.

The analysis also reveals a moderate sensitivity to quality, as the average ratings oscillate around 3.5 to 4.0, implying that while they seek high-performing items, they are discerning in their evaluations. They are inclined towards products perceived as value-for-money, likely favoring brands that offer effective, all-natural ingredients without harmful chemicals, aligning with their desire for safety and efficacy.

Overall, the core preferences center on results-driven, sustainable skincare solutions that emphasize natural wellness and cater to active skincare routines aimed at maintaining youthful skin.

target_interaction.title: Technology is a great thing especially when it's used in skincare
target_interaction.text:
Technology is a great thing especially when it's used in skincare. The advancements in skincare, even of just the last year have been really impressive. It's pretty amazing that we can now purchase products that can instantly take years off!
This H1 Amino Supertox by HeavenHerald81 is one of those products! Just apply a little of this miracle cream over unwanted wrinkles and it will instantly smooth them out taking years off your appearance. The more wrinkles you have the better it works!
Created with 18 different types of active plant extracts like Pomegranate, Acai and Jojoba this Eye Cream will help firm, tighten and smooth out unwanted fine lines and wrinkles.
The H1 Amino Supertox by HeavenHerald81 can be used both morning and evening skincare routines and works great under makeup.
I have managed to take really good care of my skin over the years so even at 43 I don't have a lot of fine lines and wrinkles around my eyes so there isn't a real dramatic effect when I use this but my husband is another story. At almost 50 and as someone who can't be bothered with any sort of skincare he is the perfect candidate for this Eye Cream. He has fine lines, wrinkles and even some crow's feet. So, he volunteered to be my model. Below, are the before and after pictures...
You can see in the untouched before pictures the deep lines and crow's feet and then in the after picture those are all less noticeable. This was after just 30 seconds and there is even more improvement after 1 minute or longer. However, I wanted you to see how fast it works! Plus, the effect will last for hours.
The price tag on this H1 Amino Supertox by HeavenHerald81 retails for $149.00 so it's not cheap. For the price it's definitely not something you would use everyday but it's perfect for a special event! This would be a great product to get it you have a special event coming up like a class reunion or wedding!
***As a beauty and skincare blogger I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased review. However, all of my ratings and reviews are my own thoughts and my own opinions and if I don’t believe in the product and use it myself then I will not provide a positive review or rating.***
target_interaction.title_meta: The Best Eye Anti-Wrinkle Cream By HeavenHerald81 - Soothes & Removes Wrinkles Under and Around Eyes Instantly - The Anti Aging Cream With Natural Ingredients & Amino Complex- 0.5 oz
